skins.shipDescription: Kent-class heavy cruiser - Suffolk, Hull Number 55!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the fifth ship of the Kent-class. Although I look like this, I can still pull it off when it counts. During the Battle of the Denmark Strait, I basically saved the day!
skins.acquisition: Where am I...? Ah, excuse me! Do you kno....Oh! You're the commander? This is great! I'm Suffolk, I finally found you!
skins.login: Commander, you're back! Me? I'm looking at the clouds.
skins.details: My post-retrofit performance is very impressive!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My greatest accomplishments were done just watching the waves like this.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, want to watch the clouds with me? I bet we'll see some wonderful things!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Don't look at me like that, I've been to plenty of places before!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... Ah! Commander! If you were here you should have said something.

skins.shipDescription: Whew... At long last, after all that hard work, I get to wear this uniform as well. Even though all I did was... Huh? Lead by example? Be a role model? I don't get it...
skins.acquisition: Whew... At long last, after all that hard work, I get to wear this uniform as well. Even though all I did was... Huh? Lead by example? Be a role model? I don't get it...
skins.details: Now I can do more than ever before!
skins.secretaryIdle1: This skirt is so long.... One of these days I'll space out and trip on it....
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, I found an interesting flower, do you want to water it with me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, did you know? After my retrofit, my radar became super strong! Huh? Then keep working? I'm... I'm sorry...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, let me pour you some tea. Oh, oh, oh! Be careful!
